name: ENDOADAPTIONIST MUTATION
effect: You may choose an additional piece of Pilot Gear representing advanced gene-hacking, it cannot be confiscated from you under normal circumstances

name: NANOBACTERIAL EXPERT
effect: Any source of Burn damage that you cause also causes the target to suffer the Poisoned condition

name: CRADELIZING GENERATOR
effect: You keep a Cradelization die that starts at 1, add 1 to the die every time you create or destroy a piece of terrain. If the die is at 6, on your turn you may reset it to 1 and take a Quick Action as a Free Action. The die persists after a Scene, but resets on a Full Rest.
